item.itunes:title: Listen to this if you are going through a breakup
item.title: Listen to this if you are going through a breakup
item.itunes:author: Joey Kidney
item.description:
Breakups hurt so much because you once envisioned a whole entire life with someone to the point where you lost who you are without them. And that is usually why couples tend to distance themselves because one partner loses who they are and become dependant on the other. And once the weight becomes too heavy, someone has to break. 



Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-happy-times/exclusive-content

item.itunes:title: Listen to this if you want to make 2022 YOUR year
item.title: Listen to this if you want to make 2022 YOUR year
item.itunes:author: Joey Kidney
item.description:
It is the time of year where everyone comes up with these crazy resolutions of things that they genuinely hate doing. Thinking that the new year will change their way of thinking but give it a week and they are back in the slump and feeling unmotivated because they failed. So let's make a list of things that you actually enjoy doing.

Let's make 2022 YOUR year!

item.itunes:summary:
This is something that you need to try! Japanese Psychology! I hope you can sit down and do this with me. Here are the questions:
Write ten things you did this past week?
What do you love? What does the world need? What are you good at? What can you get paid for?
And the last three: What have I received from? What have I given to? What troubles and difficulties have I caused?
